wikipedia_page.main: James Macnaghten McGarel Hogg, 1st Baron Magheramorne, KCB (3 May 1823 – 27 June 1890), was a British politician, Member of Parliament, and local government leader.

response: He was the second son of James McGarel-Hogg, 1st Baron Magheramorne and was educated at Radley College.  He inherited the peerage from his brother in 1903.  Like his father, Magheramorne was a Conservative and Unionist.
